code: import React,{Component}from"react";import NameTagList from"./NameTagList.js";import UserInput from"./UserInput.js";class App extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={names:[]};this.addName=name=>{const newNames=[name,...this.state.names];this.setState({names:newNames});};this.removeName=clickedIndex=>{const filterCallback=(_,index)=>index!==clickedIndex;const newNames=this.state.names.filter(filterCallback);this.setState({names:newNames});};}componentDidUpdate(){const savedNamesString=JSON.stringify(this.state.names);localStorage.setItem("savedNames",savedNamesString);}componentDidMount(){const savedNamesString=localStorage.getItem("savedNames");if(savedNamesString){const savedNames=JSON.parse(savedNamesString);this.setState({names:savedNames});}}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"App"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",null,"Name Tag Generator"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(UserInput,{addName:this.addName}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(NameTagList,{names:this.state.names,removeName:this.removeName}));}}export default App;
